article.headline: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A stock rises Thursday, outperforms market
article.body: Shares of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A BRK.A, +0.06% rallied 1.16% to $323,275.00 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.80% to 3,446.83 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.43% to 28,425.51. This was the stock's second consecutive day of gains. Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A closed $24,125.00 below its 52-week high ($347,400.00), which the company reached on January 17th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as Honeywell International Inc. HON, +0.34% rose 1.30% to $173.78, 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% rose 0.73% to $167.71, and General Electric Co. GE, +2.85% rose 5.39% to $6.65. Trading volume (314) remained 78 below its 50-day average volume of 392.
